ygData.subject: Re: Level 30 song
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, there IS a level 30 song, although last I have heard, no one has located it yet.... or rather, no one has retrieved it yet. The level 30 song is a
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Eric <eranan@...>
>
>Does anyone know what the level 30 bard song is?
>
>I am approaching level 31 and all the bards i have talked to on
>different servers don't think there is a level 30 song.


Yes, there IS a level 30 song, although last I have heard, no one has
located it yet.... or rather, no one has retrieved it yet.

The level 30 song is a Group Haste song which is supposed to be stackable
with Anthem. It is a quest item. If the quest is the one I have found (as
I've been told it is), don't expect to complete the quest unless you are in
a party of near-40th-level characters.

Linako LindenLyre of MithMarr
